text: Reboot Camp is an American comedy film. It is slated to premiere at the Austin Film Festival. The film was written and directed by Ivo Raza. It features an ensemble cast including David Lipper, Lindsey Shaw, Keli Price, Ja Rule, Chaz Bono, David Koechner, Eric Roberts Maya Stojan and Ed Begley Jr. == Plot == The comedy follows brothers Danny and Gordon who create Reboot Camp, a fake self-help group, and its leader Gordon to expose the exploitive practices of fake gurus and how easy it is to con people into believing just about anything. To their surprise, their absurd Reboot Camp becomes a big success with a devoted following. == Cast == == Production == === Development and production === The film was written and directed by independent filmmaker Ivo Raza. The film was produced by David Lipper and Tina Sutakanat, executive producers Bernard Azer and Alan Braverman. === Filming === The film was shot in and around Los Angeles, cinematographer was Derrick Cohan. It is currently in post production. == References == == External links == *
title: Reboot Camp
